item.title: Billionaire Mark Cuban And Humana Tease A New Pharmacy Deal Aimed At Cutting Out Middlemen: Report
item.description: The announcement was made by Cuban and Humana CEO at the Forbes health care conference, Bloomberg reported.

item.title: Stellantis CEO Says New Engine, Vehicle Models Will Drive ‘Progressively Better’ Demand
item.description: Filosa said that the company is on track on its full year guidance through the end of November.

item.title: Paramount Warns Netflix Deal For Warner Bros. Discovery Would ‘Never Close’ Amid Regulatory Hurdles: Report
item.description: Paramount argued its proposal offers a clean regulatory path as Warner Bros. Discovery seeks new bids and moves to wrap up the auction this month.

item.title: PepsiCo Is Close To Striking A Settlement With Activist Giant Elliott After Its $4B Push For Change
item.description: Details of the settlement could not be learnt, the Wall Street Journal said.
